content: washcloth from the chart cast on 43 sts and knit 1 row slipping the first stitch of every row purlwise with yarn at back of work knit 7 row next row sl 1 k5 p to last 6 sts k6 work the lace pattern from the chart reading rs odd-numbered row from right to left and ws even-numbered row from left to right work the 16-row chart pattern twice then work row 1-8 once again to finish the washcloth knit 8 row then cast off loosely darn in yarn ends and block if necessary slip k on rs p on ws k2 decrease yo ssk k on ws sl 1 k2 decrease psso the small print leaf lace washcloth design text chart and photographs © jan eaton 2010 all rights reserved this material is covered by copyright law and all rights remain with the designer no part of this pattern may be reproduced in any form transmitted in any form or by any means be it print electronic photocopying translation or otherwise in any format or under any circumstances without prior permission of the copyright holder similarly this item may not be reproduced or used for any commercial purposes including promotion or sales individual or otherwise without prior permission of the copyright holder email wibbos works@yahoo co uk 2
